attributes.action: make public the secret police  internal report on the social impact of the proposed Las Vegas-style Super Casinos in which they raised concerns that they would cause crime and anti-social behaviour to rise and lure vulnerable groups into gambling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The link between the Gambling Industry and Crime is allegedly well known and documented involving the Mafia and other criminal organisations, money laundering, drug trafficing and the sex industry - These proposed Super Casinos will not Regenerate they will Degenerate and are not in keeping with British values and traditions.
